comments:
Scenario:
1. Create a project with a Java file (say Hello.java)
2. Edit the Java file
3. Remove all projects from the packages navigator, editor is closed
4. Do menu > File , notice "Save Hello.java As..." is enabled, regular save is 
not, but still mentions Hello.java
5. Do something to add something to the workspace
6. Result is internal error - outline view cannot be created. 
   The outline view is never properly updated (except when manually removed
   and added to the workbench again).

7. See the (notoriously well hidden) error log:
